amendments.title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Food Products Standards and Food Additives) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.description: Amendments to food products standards and food additives regulations
amendments.relevance_reason: Nutri Foods imports and distributes food products, so changes to product standards and permitted additives may affect the compliance of its imported goods.
amendments.potential_impact: May require review of ingredient lists, additive approvals, and possible reformulation or sourcing adjustments for imported items.
assumed_product_categories: All food categories imported for sale

amendments.title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Vegan Foods) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.relevance_reason: If Nutri Foods imports vegan‑type products, the new vegan‑food rules would apply to its distribution activities.
amendments.potential_impact: Could impose labeling, ingredient, or certification requirements specific to vegan foods, affecting import clearance and marketability.

amendments.title: Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.description: The amendment aims to revise the labelling and display requirements for food products, specifically regarding nutrition information and labeling.
amendments.relevance_reason: As an importer of packaged foods, Nutri Foods must ensure that product labels meet the revised nutrition and display standards.
amendments.potential_impact: May necessitate label redesign, updated nutrition facts, and verification of compliance before products enter the Indian market.

amendments.title: Food Safety and Standards (Packaging) First Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.description: The amendment revises the packaging regulations for food products, focusing on the use of certain materials and compliance with safety standards.
amendments.relevance_reason: Imported goods must be packaged in materials that comply with the new safety standards, making this amendment relevant to Nutri Foods' supply chain.
amendments.potential_impact: May require verification of packaging material compliance, possible repackaging, or supplier changes to meet the new regulations.
assumed_product_categories: All packaged food items imported for distribution
